snippet.title: Manchester City's new website relegates women to the margins of football
snippet.description:
Manchester City's new website relegates women to the margins of football by Kirsten Schlewitz on Mar 11 2014, 10:50a
On International Women's Day, Manchester City launched a new section of their website dedicated to female fans. Unfortunately, the site did more to marginalize women than to embrace them as true...

snippet.title: How Joe Johnson can steal the show at All-Star Weekend
snippet.description:
How Joe Johnson can steal the show at All-Star Weekend by Eddie Maisonet on Feb 7 2014, 3:04p
One could say that Joe Johnson doesn't deserve to be in the 2014 All-Star Game. To that, I say hogwash! Here are three ways the quiet and probably-undeserving Nets shooting guard can steal the show...

snippet.title: NFL awards: Peyton Manning wins MVP, Luke Kuechly DPOY
snippet.description:
NFL awards: Peyton Manning wins MVP, Luke Kuechly DPOY by Mark Sandritter on Feb 1 2014, 6:42p
To little surprise, Peyton Manning won his fifth MVP. Luke Kuechly added Defensive Player of the Year to his resume.

snippet.title: Pro Football Hall of Fame 2014 class: Ray Guy, Michael Strahan, Andre Reed among enshrinees
snippet.description:
Pro Football Hall of Fame 2014 class: Ray Guy, Michael Strahan, Andre Reed among enshrinees by Jeff Gray on Feb 1 2014, 7:19p
The NFL has announced its class of 2014 for the Pro Football Hall of Fame, including linebacker Derrick Brooks and Ray Guy, the first-ever punter to make it.

snippet.title: Game manager: Russell Wilson has been stamped with a label most quarterbacks resent, but what kind of player is he really?
snippet.description:
Game manager: Russell Wilson has been stamped with a label most quarterbacks resent, but what kind of player is he really? by Danny Kelly on Jan 31 2014, 11:55a
Super Bowl XLVIII is one of the most intriguing and compelling NFL Championship match-ups in recent history. It's Peyton Manning's Broncos, one of the greatest passing offenses of all time,...

snippet.title: NFL Honors Awards Show 2014: Peyton Manning, Luke Kuechly to take top honors?
snippet.description:
NFL Honors Awards Show 2014: Peyton Manning, Luke Kuechly to take top honors? by James Brady on Feb 1 2014, 8:01a
Peyton Manning is essentially a shoe-in for the MVP award, but many of the other top honors are closer than you might think this year.

snippet.title: Watch Super Bowl pregame online, TV schedule, radio and more
snippet.description:
Watch Super Bowl pregame online, TV schedule, radio and more by Mark Sandritter on Feb 2 2014, 10:11a
There will be extensive pregame coverage of Super Bowl XLVIII and you can find out when and where to watch here.

snippet.title: Super Bowl 2014: Russell Wilson's date with history
snippet.description:
Super Bowl 2014: Russell Wilson's date with history by Mark Sandritter on Jan 28 2014, 10:43a
Seattle's quarterback has been called a lot of things -- too short, game manager, etc. This week, he has the chance to add "Super Bowl winner" to that list, in only his second NFL season.

snippet.title: The Notebook: Collapses, comebacks & getting ready to do it all again
snippet.description:
The Notebook: Collapses, comebacks & getting ready to do it all again by Stephen White on Jan 9 2014, 9:36a
Retired defensive end Stephen White opens up his postseason edition of his Notebook.

snippet.title: The big 2013 Liberty Bowl breakdown: Turnarounds for Mississippi State, Rice
snippet.description:
The big 2013 Liberty Bowl breakdown: Turnarounds for Mississippi State, Rice by Bill Connelly on Dec 30 2013, 2:00p
In 2013, Mississippi State pulled a 2012 Rice, improving late in the season to reach a bowl and get its coach off of a relatively hot seat. Can the young Bulldogs ride quite a few defensive...
